title: nenju porukkuthillayE
sahitya: nenju porukkudillaiyE (en) inda nilai keTTa manidarai ninaindu viTTAlanupallavi  anji anji shAvAr ivar anjAda poruLillai avaniyilEcaraNam  kanci kuDipadarkillAr adan kAraNangaL ivai ennum ariyumillArtanda poruLaik-koNDE janam tAnguvAr ulagattil arasharellAmanda arashiyalai ivar anjutaru pEiyenreNNi nenjam ayarvAr
